snippet: DUKE--Robin Chandler. The Board of Directors, Overseers and staff of the International Rescue Committee are saddened by the death of our dear friend and colleague Robin Chandler Duke, a humanitarian leader and tireless advocate for refugees, women's rights, family planning and reproductive health. Robin, who was U.S. ambassador to Norway from 2000 to 2001, was a longtime member of the IRC Board of Directors and later of the IRC Overseers. In death she joins her beloved husband, Angier Biddle Duke, a former U.S ambassador and president of the IRC, who died in 1995. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to her family. A celebration of Robin's life will be held in New York City in the spring. International Rescue Committee, Sarah O'Hagan and Thomas Schick, Co-Chairs of the Board; Timothy Geithner, Chair, IRC Overseers; David Miliband, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: DUKE--Robin Chandler. The Board of Directors, Overseers and staff of the International Rescue Committee are saddened by the death of our dear friend and colleague Robin Chandler Duke, a humanitarian leader and tireless advocate for refugees, women's rights, family planning and reproductive health. Robin, who was U.S. ambassador to Norway from 2000 to 2001, was a longtime member of the IRC Board of Directors and later of the IRC Overseers. In death she joins her beloved husband, Angier Biddle Duke, a former U.S ambassador and president of the IRC, who died in 1995. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to her family. A celebration of Robin's life will be held in New York City in the spring. International Rescue Committee, Sarah O'Hagan and Thomas Schick, Co-Chairs of the Board; Timothy Geithner, Chair, IRC Overseers; David Miliband, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DUKE, ROBIN CHANDLER
